target.name: Chapter
target.text: ICEcorps Quick Start

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Getting Started

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Find your way around with the Navigator

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Explore the Welcome Portlet

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Buddy List

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Add buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start typing a name in either the Users or the Groups box. A dropdown list displays matching names. Select a name and click Apply to add the name to your list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add as many names as you want, clicking Apply after each one.

target.name: Step
target.text: To remove a name, click the x icon after the name; then click Apply.

target.name: Step
target.text: When you finish, click Close.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Tips for using your buddy list

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Folder Bookmarks Portlet

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Configuring Your Workspace

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add info and a photo to your profile

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Navigator, click My workspace to go to your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Navigator, click My workspace to go to your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the menu bar for your workspace, click Modify profile.

target.name: Step
target.text: Fill in any missing information. This information is visible to others and is also used by ICEcorps and Zon to contact you by phone, email, or instant messaging.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add a picture. Click BrowseÉ to look for a graphics file on your computer.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK to close the form.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Remove an image from your profile

target.name: Procedure
target.text: To remove an image from your profile, click Modify profile.

target.name: Step
target.text: To remove an image from your profile, click Modify profile.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the check box next to each image you want to delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK. The images are removed.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Tips for adding photos to your profile

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Creating Content

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Folder types

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Blogs

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Start a blog in your workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click My workspace to display your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click My workspace to display your personal workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the workspace menu bar, click Manage this workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Add new folder. A form for adding a folder appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Title field, enter a title for your blog.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under Select a template, choose Blog folder.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK to create the blog.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add your first blog entry

target.name: Procedure
target.text: On the menu bar above the blog calendar, click New and select Blog entry.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the menu bar above the blog calendar, click New and select Blog entry.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the entry form that appears, enter the title of your blog entry in the Title box.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Description box, enter the content of your blog entry, using the rich formatting tools in the editor.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK to add the entry to your blog.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add a comment to a blog entry

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click the icon beneath the blog entry.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the icon beneath the blog entry.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the form that appears, enter the title of your blog comment in the Title box.

target.name: Step
target.text: Enter your comment in the Description box.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK. Your comment appears below the blog entry.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Rate an entry in a blog, wiki, or discussion

target.name: Procedure
target.text: View an entry in a blog, wiki, or discussion folder

target.name: Step
target.text: View an entry in a blog, wiki, or discussion folder

target.name: Step
target.text: Drag the mouse over the rating stars above the entry to highlight the desired number of stars (1 to 5).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click to register your rating. The average rating and the number of ratings are updated immediately.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Work with teams

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Create a team workspace:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Navigator, click on the workspace tree to expand it.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Navigator, click on the workspace tree to expand it.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click on the Teams branch of the workspace tree.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the Teams tab that appears, click Manage this workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Add new workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Title field, enter the name for your new workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK. The new workspace is added to Teams.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Add folders to the team workspace

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click on Manage this workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click on Manage this workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add new folder.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the form that appears, enter a name in the Title field and select the template for the folder that you want to add (Discussion, Blog folder, Calendar folder, etc.)

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK. The folder is added to the workspace.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Add a team to a workspace or folder:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: On the tab for the folder or workspace, click Access control.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the tab for the folder or workspace, click Access control.

target.name: Step
target.text: Change the setting for Inherit role membership from the parent folder or workspace to No and click Apply.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Roles table, select Team Member for every user (or group of users) that you want to add to the team.

target.name: Step
target.text: If a user is not shown in the Roles table, click Add a user. Begin typing the user name and select the name from the dropdown list. Then click Team Member for that user.

target.name: Step
target.text: When you have finished adding members, click Save changes, then Close.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: View team members:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the workspace or folder with which the team is associated.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the workspace or folder with which the team is associated.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the menu bar, click Team.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click View members.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Creating a team meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: On the menu bar, click Team.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the menu bar, click Team.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Create a meeting. The Add meeting form appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Select all to create a meeting with all team members, or select the individual members to invite.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start meeting to start a meeting immediately, or click Schedule to arrange a meeting in the future.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Sending mail to your team:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: 5. On the menu bar, click Team.

target.name: Step
target.text: 5. On the menu bar, click Team.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Send mail to members. The Send email form appears:

target.name: Step
target.text: To send mail to all team members, click Select all.

target.name: Step
target.text: Fill in the Subject and Message.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK to send the message. The message contains a link back to your workspace.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Tips for working with teams

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Use Favorites for places you visit often

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To add a place to Favorites:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Navigate to the workspace or folder that you want to add to your Favorites list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Navigate to the workspace or folder that you want to add to your Favorites list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click to open the Favorites menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Bookmark this place. The workspace or folder is added at the end of the Favorites list.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To return to one of your Favorites:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click to open the Favorites menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click to open the Favorites menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click on the name of a place that you previously added to the Favorites list.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To delete one or more Favorites from your list:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Favorites menu, click Edit Favorites.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Favorites menu, click Edit Favorites.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select each of the places to delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Delete, then OK. The places are removed from your Favorites list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Close the Favorites menu.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To change the order of the items in your Favorites list:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Favorites menu, click Edit Favorites.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Favorites menu, click Edit Favorites.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one or more items in the list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Down or Up to move the selected items down or up.

target.name: Step
target.text: When you finish, click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Close the Favorites menu.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Tagging

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To add tags to a workspace, folder, or entry:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Start in the place that you want to tag. Any tags already assigned to this place are displayed below the icon.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start in the place that you want to tag. Any tags already assigned to this place are displayed below the icon.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click to open the Add/Delete Tags form. Any previously assigned tags are also listed here.

target.name: Step
target.text: In either the Personal tags or Shared tags text box, type the new tag and click Add. As you type, a dropdown list displays existing tags that match the letters in the box. When you click Add, the tag is added to the list of tags assigned to this place.

target.name: Step
target.text: When you finish adding tags, close the Add/Delete Tags form by clicking the x in the upper right corner of the form. You will now see the new tags below the icon.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To remove tags from a place:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click to open the Add/Delete Tags form.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click to open the Add/Delete Tags form.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Delete for every tag that you want to delete.

target.name: Step
target.text: When you finish deleting tags, close the Add/Delete Tags form by clicking the x in the upper right corner of the form. The tags that you deleted are removed from the list of tags beneath the icon.

target.name: Sect3
target.text: To use tags in a search:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Find tags box in the Navigator, start typing the personal or shared tag that you want to search for. As you type, a dropdown list displays tags that match the letters that you've typed.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Find tags box in the Navigator, start typing the personal or shared tag that you want to search for. As you type, a dropdown list displays tags that match the letters that you've typed.

target.name: Step
target.text: Finish typing the tag (or select it from the list) and press Enter.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Relevance Rankings

target.name: Sect3
target.text: Tips for working with tags:
